query-mapping.description: The list of documents for a given folder.

class.name: AWA.Images.Models.Image_Info
class.comment: The list of images for a given folder.

property.name: id
property.comment: the storage identifier which contains the image data.

query.name: image-list
query.comment: Get a list of images for a given folder.
query.sql: SELECT st.id, st.name, st.create_date, st.uri, st.storage, st.mime_type, st.file_size, img.width, img.height, img.thumb_width, img.thumb_height, img.thumbnail_id FROM awa_storage AS st INNER JOIN awa_acl AS acl ON acl.entity_id = st.workspace_id AND acl.entity_type = $entity_type[awa_workspace] AND acl.permission = $permission[storage-create] AND acl.user_id = :user_id INNER JOIN awa_image AS img ON img.storage_id = st.id WHERE st.folder_id = :folder_id AND st.original_id IS NULL ORDER BY st.create_date DESC
